channel.title: Rune subtraction?
channel.description: Hello, im Hippyss i have a problem i resently added runes needed to cast spells but [b]here's my problem[/b] [u]When i cast the spell with the runes in my inventory it does not subtract any runes from my stack of runes instead it cast's the spells without subtracting any[/u].[b]Heres what i would like it to do[/b]. I want it to subtract runes and cast the spell. I'd be a Tightwad if i didn't offer a reward for helping me so you my choose one of these two rewards. A.) a banner ad for your server on my website. b.) a Certain ++ on mopar. Thanks in advance Hippy. NOTE: you only get the reward if your code / edit FIXES it.

item.title: Rune subtraction?
item.dc:creator: @hippyss hippyss
item.description:
@hippyss wrote:

[quote=“Hiaburi, post:11, topic:86458”]Seems lime everyone got your problem fixed, jsut figured i would point out, wow for once some one asked for help without saying “Free admin to anyone who helps”[/quote] lol i hate that so i thought i’d mix it up.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune subtraction?
item.dc:creator: @_Nirvana † Nirvana †
item.description:
@_Nirvana wrote:

if(spellID == 1190) // sara stike spell { if(playerHasItemAmount(RUNEID, AMOUNT)==false) && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2415) && (playerLevel[6] >= 59) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need AMOUNT "+getItemName(RUNEID)); } else if(playerHasItemAmount(RUNEID, AMOUNT)==true) { if(charge >= 1) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); } else { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(20); } castOnPlayer.saraTimer = 4; stillgfx(83, absY+1, absX); stillgfx(83, absY-1, absX); stillgfx(83, absY, absX+1); stillgfx(83, absY, absX-1); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(67, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(76, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 10; sendMessage("You Use Saradomin Strike."); deleteItem(RUNEID, getItemSlot(RUNEID), AMOUNT); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 60) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 60 to cast this spell."); } }

if(spellID == 1191) // claws of guthix - level 60 spell { if(playerHasItemAmount(RUNEID, AMOUNT)==false) && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2416) && (playerLevel[6] >= 59) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 25 "+getItemName(565)); } else if(playerHasItemAmount(565, 25)==true) { else if(playerHasItemAmount(565, 25)==true) { if(charge >= 1) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); } else { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(20); } castOnPlayer.saraTimer = 4; hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30); stillgfx(83, absY+1, absX); stillgfx(83, absY-1, absX); stillgfx(83, absY, absX+1); stillgfx(83, absY, absX-1); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(187, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(79, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.Teleblock(); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 10; sendMessage("You poison and teleblock the enemy."); deleteItem(RUNEID, getItemSlot(RUNEID), AMOUNT); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 59) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 60 to cast this spell."); }

if(spellID == 1192) // flames of zammy - level 60 spell { if(playerHasItemAmount(RUNEID, AMOUNT)==false) && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2417) && (playerLevel[6] >= 59) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need AMOUNT "+getItemName(RUNEID)); } else if(playerHasItemAmount(565, 25)==true) { else if(playerHasItemAmount(565, 25)==true) { if(charge >= 1) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); } else { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(20); } castOnPlayer.saraTimer = 4; hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30); stillgfx(83, absY+1, absX); stillgfx(83, absY-1, absX); stillgfx(83, absY, absX+1); stillgfx(83, absY, absX-1); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(69, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(78, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 10; deleteItem(RUNEID, getItemSlot(RUNEID), AMOUNT); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 59) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 60 to cast this spell."); } }

OK im almost done just checking and finishing off god spells

Read full topic

item.title: Rune subtraction?
item.dc:creator: @hippyss hippyss
item.description:
@hippyss wrote:

It worked but i wanna make it so you can’t cast it without first having the runes.
Heres the rough look of my spells if you can edit to the point where they work (subtracting runes and cast) then the reward is yours } else if(spellID == 1190) { // sara strike if(playerLevel[6] >= 60 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2415) { if(charge >= 1) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); } else { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(20); } castOnPlayer.saraTimer = 4; castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; startAnimation(811); } else { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 60 and a Sara staff to cast this spell."); startAnimation(0); } } else if(spellID == 1191) { // claws of guthix if(playerLevel[6] >= 60 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2416) { if(charge >= 1) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); } else { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(20); } castOnPlayer.guthixTimer = 5; castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; startAnimation(811); } else { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 60 and a Guthix staff to cast this spell."); startAnimation(0); } } else if(spellID == 1192) { // flames of zammy if(playerLevel[6] >= 60 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2417) { if(charge >= 1) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); } else { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(20); } castOnPlayer.zammyTimer = 6; castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; startAnimation(811); } else { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 60 and a Zammy staff to cast this spell."); startAnimation(0); } } else if(spellID == 1572) { //bind level 20 if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 20) { sendMessage("This player is currently immune to this spell."); startAnimation(0); } else if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == true && playerLevel[6] >= 20) { sendMessage("This player is already being held by a magical force."); startAnimation(0); } else if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == false && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 20) { ProjectileSpellPlayer(177, 178, 181, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 79); castOnPlayer.bind(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; castOnPlayer.meStill(); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("A magical force stops you from moving!"); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 19) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 20 to cast this spell."); startAnimation(0); } } else if(spellID == 1582) { //snare level 50 if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 50) { sendMessage("This player is currently immune to this spell."); startAnimation(0); } else if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == true && playerLevel[6] >= 50) { sendMessage("This player is already being held by a magical force."); startAnimation(0); } else if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == false && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 50) { ProjectileSpellPlayer(177, 178, 180, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 50); castOnPlayer.snare(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; castOnPlayer.meStill(); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("A magical force stops you from moving!"); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 49) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 50 to cast this spell."); startAnimation(0); } } else if(spellID == 1592) { //entangle level 79 if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 79) { sendMessage("This player is currently immune to this spell."); startAnimation(0); } else if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == true && playerLevel[6] >= 79) { sendMessage("This player is already being held by a magical force."); startAnimation(0); } else if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == false && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 79) { ProjectileSpellPlayer(177, 178, 179, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 79); castOnPlayer.entangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; castOnPlayer.meStill(); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("A magical force stops you from moving!"); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 78) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 79 to cast this spell."); startAnimation(0); } } else if(spellID == 12445) { //teleblock (lvl 85 spell) if(castOnPlayer.checkTeleblock() == true && castOnPlayer.checkTeleblock2() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 85) { sendMessage("This player is currently immune to teleblock."); startAnimation(0); } else if(castOnPlayer.checkTeleblock() == true && castOnPlayer.checkTeleblock2() == true && playerLevel[6] >= 85) { sendMessage("This player is already affected by this spell."); startAnimation(0); } else if(castOnPlayer.checkTeleblock() == false && castOnPlayer.checkTeleblock2() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 85) { startAnimation(1819); castOnPlayer.Teleblock(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 84) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 85 to cast this spell."); startAnimation(0); } } else if(spellID == 12975) { // smoke barrage (lvl 86 spell) if(playerLevel[6] >= 86) { startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(391, 39, 10); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(27); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; sendMessage("You poison the enemy!"); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 85){ sendMessage("You need a magic level of 86 to cast this spell."); startAnimation(0); } } else if(spellID == 12861) { // ice rush (lvl 58 spell) if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 58) { startAnimation(1978); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(18); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; ProjectileSpellPlayer(360, 360, 361, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 58); } else if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == true && playerLevel[6] >= 58) { startAnimation(1978); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(18); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; ProjectileSpellPlayer(360, 360, 361, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 58); meStill(); } else if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == false && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 58) { startAnimation(1978); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(18); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; ProjectileSpellPlayer(360, 360, 361, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 58); castOnPlayer.rush(); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 57) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 58 to cast this spell."); startAnimation(0); } } else if(spellID == 12881) { // ice burst (lvl 70 spell) if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 70) { startAnimation(1979); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(22); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; attackPlayersWithin(363, 39, 10); } else if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == true && playerLevel[6] >= 70) { startAnimation(1979); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(22); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; attackPlayersWithin(363, 39, 10); } else if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == false && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 70) { startAnimation(1979); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(22); castOnPlayer.burst(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; attackPlayersWithin(363, 39, 10); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); castOnPlayer.meStill(); meStill(); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 69) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 70 to cast this spell."); startAnimation(0); } } else if(spellID == 12871) { // ice blitz (lvl 82 spell) if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 82) { startAnimation(1978); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(26); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); stillgfx(368, absY, absX); stillgfx(367, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); PkingDelay = 3; } else if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == true && playerLevel[6] >= 82) { startAnimation(1978); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(26); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); stillgfx(368, absY, absX); stillgfx(367, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); PkingDelay = 3; } else if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == false && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 82) { startAnimation(1978); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(26); castOnPlayer.blitz(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); stillgfx(368, absY, absX); stillgfx(367, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You are frozen!"); PkingDelay = 3; castOnPlayer.meStill(); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 81) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 82 to cast this spell."); startAnimation(0); } } else if(spellID == 12891) { // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 39, 10); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; } else if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == true && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == true && playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 39, 10); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; } else if(castOnPlayer.checkHoldcooldown() == false && castOnPlayer.checkHold() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 39, 10); castOnPlayer.barrage(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); castOnPlayer.meStill(); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); startAnimation(0); } } else if(spellID == 13023) { // shadow barrage (lvl 88 spell) if(playerLevel[6] >= 88) { startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(382,39, 10); hitDiff = 9 + misc.random(28); heal = 10; playerLevel[3] += heal; updateRequired = true; hitUpdateRequired = true; PkingDelay = 3; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 87) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 88 to cast this spell."); startAnimation(0); } } else if(spellID == 12911) { // blood blitz (lvl 80 spell) if(playerLevel[6] >= 80) { startAnimation(1978); hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(24); NewHP += hitDiff; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } updateRequired = true; castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); stillgfx(376, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); sendMessage("You drain the enemys life and add it to yours"); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("Your life is drained!"); PkingDelay = 3; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 79) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 80 to cast this spell."); } } else if(spellID == 12929) { // blood barrage (lvl 92 spell) if(playerLevel[6] >= 92) { startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(377, 39, 10); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(29); NewHP += hitDiff / 2; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } updateRequired = true; castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 3; castOnPlayer.sendMessage("Your life has been drained!"); sendMessage("You drain the enemys life and add it to yours."); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 91) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 92 to cast this spell."); startAnimation(0); }

Read full topic

item.title: Rune subtraction?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Put this in each spell code

deleteItem(ITEMID, getItemSlot(ITEMID), AMOUNT);

Add 1 of those for each rune type you want deleted.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune subtraction?
item.dc:creator: @hippyss hippyss
item.description:
@hippyss wrote:

Hello, im Hippyss i have a problem i resently added runes needed to cast spells but here’s my problem
When i cast the spell with the runes in my inventory it does not subtract any runes from my stack of runes instead it cast’s the spells without subtracting any.Heres what i would like it to do. I want it to subtract runes and cast the spell.
I’d be a Tightwad if i didn’t offer a reward for helping me so you my choose one of these two rewards.
A.) a banner ad for your server on my website.
b.) a Certain ++ on mopar.
Thanks in advance Hippy.
NOTE: you only get the reward if your code / edit FIXES it.

Read full topic
